page.title: 02Local History - The Hultons
page.content: { { {Over Hulton}and{Middle Hulton}are closely associated with the Hulton family, the Lords of the Manor since the 13th century; the present head of the family, Sir Geoffrey Hulton, Bart. still owns approx. 2500 acres of land here. In Hulton Park, which covers 250 acres, there have been 2 large halls; the second one was demolished in l959 due to spiralling costs and Sir Geoffrey now lives in the Manchester Rd. cottage, formerly the dower house. There are 10 tenant farmers on the estate and Home Farm, originally the family farm which provided food for the manor, is the largest.{
